features.title: Mobile Touch Controls
features.description: Implement touch controls for mobile gameplay. touchControls setting exists but is not wired up.
features.notes: Left half = P1 paddle, Right half = P2 paddle (PvP). Touch Y maps to paddle Y.

features.title: Page Transition Sound Effects
features.description: Add subtle whoosh/arrival sounds for page transitions.
features.notes: playTransitionOut: rising filtered noise sweep. playTransitionIn: descending sine.

features.title: Online Multiplayer
features.description: Add real-time online multiplayer using WebSockets.
features.notes: Would need a backend (WebSocket server). Consider Supabase Realtime or custom.

features.title: Global Leaderboards
features.description: Track and display global high scores.
